memberdef.name: eulerToQuat

detaileddescription.para: Converts the euler roll, pitch, yaw angles to quaternion components
@ param roll: the euler roll angle in radians @ param pitch: the euler pitch angle in radians @ param yaw: the euler yaw angle in radians

memberdef.argsstring: (double roll, double pitch, double yaw) noexcept
memberdef.name: Quaternion

memberdef.name: Quaternion

parameterdescription.para: if size = 3 the roll, pitch, yaw euler angles if size = 4 the i, j, k, s components if shape = [3, 3] then direction cosine matrix
